snippet: A 29-year-old student says he was abducted from Kandahar University in an episode cited by President Hamid Karzai as he rebuked American forces and banned them from Afghan schools.
abstract: Afghan student says he was abducted from Kandahar University, driven to an undisclosed location and beaten by men said to be members of an Afghan strike force backed by the Central Intelligence Agency; episode is cited by Pres Hamid Karzai as he rebukes American forces in public criticism leveled at American military allies during visit by Secretary of Defense Chuck Hagel.

byline.original: By TAIMOOR SHAH and AZAM AHMED
byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah reported from Kandahar, and Azam Ahmed from Kabul, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: A 29-year-old student says he was abducted from Kandahar University in an episode cited by President Hamid Karzai as he rebuked American forces and banned them from Afghan schools.
